name: Peanut Chikki Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Peanut Chikki Recipe: 250 gm peanuts 200 gm sugar/ jaggery 25 gm butter
instructions: Skin, roast and coarsely crush the peanuts. Heat sugar with 1/2 cup of water until thick. Boil the syrup until hard crack consistency. (Test its consistency by putting a drop in cold water- it should crack after you take it out). Add the peanuts and mix thoroughly. Grease a tray and spread the mixture. Roll flat to 1 cm in thickness. Cut into squares when cooled and store in an airtight container.
